dict.acceptation: 重要的，主要的；前列的；首位的；

sent.orig: Display leading zeros:~~Tap the leading zeros format.
sent.trans: 显示起始的零：~~点击起始零格式。

sent.orig: Leading the forefront this time, is Sunday's leading rumour mill, the News of the World.
sent.trans: 在当前处于最前沿的，是周日刚刚从谣言工厂（世界新闻）传出来的信息。

sent.orig: The leading actor is a good actor but the leading lady seems a little stiff.
sent.trans: 男主角是一位好演员，但女主角显得有些呆板。

sent.orig: The dominant seventh chord pattern consists of the dominant, leading tone (leading note), supertonic and subdominant.
sent.trans: 属七和弦模式包括属音，主音，上主音和下属音。

sent.orig: The leading actor and the leading actress are both famous American movie stars.
sent.trans: 男主角和女主角的表演者都是美国著名的影星。
